text: @ScottMorrisonMP Well done PM, just noticed the ugly & good side of humans in #coronavirus crisis, my sister being Doctor lock the gates, stay at home, my daughter being pharmacist rushing to work E’day @ Richmond hospital, so I guess our future is in good hands #auspol
